content.content: Company of Heroes Pixel (COHP) is a real-time strategy mod based on the PC game Company of Heroes 2. Players command one of five WWII factions—currently the British Forces, the Wehrmacht, the Soviet Union, and the Oberkommando West—and lead their armies to destroy enemy strongholds or capture control points.

The United States Forces are still in development, and future expansions will add the Chinese National Army, the Italian Auxiliary Army (North African SS), the Imperial Japanese Army, Free France, and the Axis Eastern European Kingdom Guard Army.
Join our official Discord server to discuss balance, share feedback, and follow the latest development updates. We're thrilled to see players around the world enjoying.

contents: Bonny_kity: Planning & Art & Coding & Balance & Map
